Title: Relates to damages recoverable when contributory negligence or assumption of risk is established in cases involving building construction, demolition and repair work
Summary: Relates to damages recoverable when contributory negligence or assumption of risk is established in cases involving building construction, demolition and repair work.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to damages recoverable when contributory negligence or assumption of risk is established in cases involving building construction, demolition and repair work
